title.rendered: BLONDISH Luxury Shoes is designed by women for women

content.rendered:
As the holiday season approaches, there is no better time to flaunt a pair of sexy, sophisticated shoes! With leopard, zebra, and feather prints to choose from, BLONDISH is sure to have the perfect party shoes to match every outfit.

BLONDISH Luxury Shoes is designed by women for women, with the intention to create stylish luxury footwear thats as comfortable as it is attractive. 

The founder, Patricia, intends on creating shoes that are made with sustainable materials and production to keep you on your toes for years to come.

www.blondish.com @blondishofficial
